title: Project Tax Liability Using Annualized Income Method
description: A freelancer with fluctuating income wants to calculate their estimated tax payments using the more complex annualized income method.

tasks.description: Gather the freelancer's income and expenses for the year to date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all financial data for the period.

tasks.description: Use Form 2210, Schedule AI (Annualized Income Installment Method), to project the income over the full year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly uses the form to annualize the income.

tasks.description: Calculate the required estimated tax payment for the current quarter based on the annualized calculation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the precise payment needed for the quarter to avoid penalties.
